level.text: The procedure established by this subchapter shall apply to any participant or beneficiary who has a claim for benefits denied under the District of Columbia Police Officers and Fire Fighters' Retirement Fund, established by § 1-712; the District of Columbia Teachers' Retirement Fund, established by § 1-713; and the District of Columbia Judges' Retirement Fund, established by § 1-714.
The procedure established by this subchapter shall apply to claims for benefits denied after March 1, 1982.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-123
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-123, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-751.
